column2: Rounding up Mirages, you say? Talk about your peculiar hobbies...
Well, around these parts, the best place to search would be the Phantom Sands not too far from this caravan.
But trust me. I’d steer clear of the place if I were you...
What do you figure those funny-looking machines are, anyway? They don’t look like Mirages. All I know is they creep me out.
I’m glad those metal menaces are finally gone. I was getting tired of having to look over my shoulder everywhere I went.
